instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2936 led green not always
threads.message:
Hi,
it's difficult to have the green led on this board (is very low light green) sometimes work.
the board work with an full charge battery, the battery indicator working, no liquid, i try new magsafe board 820-2565, same issue.
when i have not green led:
PPBUS 12,14V
SMC_PM_G2_EN = 3,491V
Pp3v42_g3h=3,49v
SMC_AOK=3,31V
I use an original charger

threads.title: 820-2936 led green not always
threads.message: Voltage on C7005? Check resistance between pins 17/18, 27/28 of the ISL6259

threads.title: 820-2936 led green not always
threads.message:
C7005 move between 2,4V and 2,6V
17/18 = 3ohm
27/28 = 20ohm
I found the problem, i change R7005 10kohm instead of 20ohm, now the green led work.
thanks for your help
